entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning near midnight and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
